alert.note: Alert for Prince Georges (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:04PM EST until January 10 at 1:47PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Maryland, including the following county, Prince Georges. * WHEN...Until 400 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 804 PM EST, Stream gauge reports along the Western Branch near Upper Marlboro were quickly rising. Flooding is expected to begin within the next few hours in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to half an inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Upper Marlboro... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
